description: Smallest number not a power of two whose reversal of its n-th power is a prime.
mathematica: Do[ k = 1; While[ Mod[ k, 10 ] == 0 || IntegerQ[ Log[ 2, k ] ] || ! PrimeQ[ ToExpression[ StringReverse[ ToString[ k^n ] ] ] ], k++ ]; Print[ k ], {n, 1, 50} ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 16 2001
